description.zh-cn: 位于欧洲的内陆国家，首都为布达佩斯。1989年成为多党议会制民主国家，1999年加入北约，2004年加入欧盟。2012年新宪法生效，国名由“匈牙利共和国”改为“匈牙利”。
description.en: A landlocked country in Europe with its capital in Budapest. It became a multi-party parliamentary democracy in 1989, joined NATO in 1999, and the European Union in 2004. A new constitution came into effect in 2012, changing the country's name from 'Republic of Hungary' to 'Hungary'.

description.zh-cn: 匈牙利政治人物，现任匈牙利总统。
description.en: Hungarian politician, current President of Hungary.

description.zh-cn: 匈牙利政治人物，现任匈牙利总理。欧洲议会于2022年将其治下的匈牙利政府列为混合型选举式威权政府。
description.en: Hungarian politician, current Prime Minister of Hungary. In 2022, the European Parliament classified his government in Hungary as a hybrid regime of electoral autocracy.

description.zh-cn: 匈牙利政治人物，现任匈牙利国民议会议长。
description.en: Hungarian politician, current Speaker of the National Assembly of Hungary.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲联盟的立法机构。于2022年9月15日投票通过议案，表示匈牙利自2018年以来不再是一个完全民主的国家。
description.en: The legislative body of the European Union. On September 15, 2022, it passed a resolution stating that Hungary has not been a full democracy since 2018.

description.zh-cn: 马扎尔人部落联盟的首领，于9世纪末期带领马扎尔人来到潘诺尼亚平原。
description.en: The head of the confederation of the Magyar tribes at the turn of the 9th and 10th centuries, who led his people into the Pannonian Plain.

description.zh-cn: 匈牙利的主体民族，于896年在多瑙河盆地定居，并建立了匈牙利国家。
description.en: The main ethnic group of Hungary, who settled in the Danube Basin in 896 and established the Hungarian state.

description.zh-cn: 9世纪时由马扎尔人建立的早期匈牙利国家。
description.en: The early Hungarian state established by the Magyars in the 9th century.

description.zh-cn: 匈牙利大公，于1000年获得教宗加冕成为首任匈牙利国王，建立匈牙利王国。
description.en: Grand Prince of the Hungarians, crowned as the first King of Hungary in 1000 by the Pope, establishing the Kingdom of Hungary.

description.zh-cn: 由伊什特万一世于1000年建立的中欧王国。1526年摩哈赤战役后国家分裂，后逐渐被哈布斯堡王朝控制，并于1867年与奥地利合组奥匈帝国。
description.en: A Central European kingdom established in 1000 by Stephen I. After the Battle of Mohács in 1526, the country was divided and later came under Habsburg control, eventually forming Austria-Hungary with Austria in 1867.

description.zh-cn: 由拔都领导的蒙古帝国对欧洲的第二次大规模军事行动，对匈牙利造成了严重破坏。
description.en: The second major military campaign of the Mongol Empire against Europe, led by Batu Khan, which caused severe destruction in Hungary.

description.zh-cn: 1526年匈牙利王国与鄂图曼帝国之间的一场战役，匈牙利战败，导致国家分裂并被鄂图曼帝国局部控制。
description.en: A battle in 1526 between the Kingdom of Hungary and the Ottoman Empire, which resulted in a Hungarian defeat, leading to the country's division and partial control by the Ottoman Empire.

description.zh-cn: 一个曾控制东南欧、西亚和北非大部分地区的帝国。在1526年第一次摩哈赤战役后局部控制匈牙利。
description.en: An empire that controlled much of Southeast Europe, Western Asia, and Northern Africa. It gained partial control over Hungary after the Battle of Mohács in 1526.

description.zh-cn: 一个由奥地利哈布斯堡王朝统治的君主国，自16世纪起统治匈牙利王国的部分领土，并在1699年后统一并统治整个匈牙利。
description.en: A monarchy ruled by the Austrian House of Habsburg, which controlled parts of the Kingdom of Hungary from the 16th century and ruled over the entire reunified Hungary after 1699.

description.zh-cn: 一场欧洲国家联盟与鄂图曼帝国之间的战争。战后，哈布斯堡王朝从鄂图曼帝国手中夺取了匈牙利。
description.en: A war between an alliance of European states and the Ottoman Empire. After the war, the Habsburg Monarchy took control of Hungary from the Ottomans.

description.zh-cn: 匈牙利政治家，领导了1848年匈牙利革命。
description.en: Hungarian statesman who led the Hungarian Revolution of 1848.

description.zh-cn: 由科苏特·拉约什领导的争取匈牙利独立的革命，最终被奥地利和俄罗斯帝国镇压。
description.en: A revolution for Hungarian independence led by Lajos Kossuth, which was ultimately suppressed by the Austrian and Russian Empires.

description.zh-cn: 1804年至1867年间的中欧多民族帝国，参与镇压了1848年匈牙利革命，后与匈牙利王国重组为奥匈帝国。
description.en: A multi-ethnic empire in Central Europe from 1804 to 1867, which suppressed the Hungarian Revolution of 1848 and later reformed with the Kingdom of Hungary to create Austria-Hungary.

description.zh-cn: 1721年至1917年间存在的帝国，曾协助奥地利帝国镇压1848年匈牙利革命。
description.en: An empire that existed from 1721 to 1917, which assisted the Austrian Empire in suppressing the Hungarian Revolution of 1848.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利帝国与匈牙利王国之间达成的协议，建立了奥匈帝国。
description.en: An agreement between the Austrian Empire and the Kingdom of Hungary that established Austria-Hungary.

description.zh-cn: 由奥地利帝国和匈牙利王国组成的二元君主国，在第一次世界大战后解体。
description.en: A dual monarchy composed of the Austrian Empire and the Kingdom of Hungary, which dissolved after World War I.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利皇帝和匈牙利国王，奥匈帝国的君主。
description.en: Emperor of Austria and King of Hungary, monarch of Austria-Hungary.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性的战争，其结束后导致奥匈帝国解体。
description.en: A global war, the end of which led to the dissolution of Austria-Hungary.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战后协约国与匈牙利签订的和平条约，使匈牙利丧失了大量领土和人口。
description.en: A peace treaty signed between the Allied Powers and Hungary after World War I, which resulted in Hungary losing a significant amount of territory and population.

description.zh-cn: 1919年存在了四个月的共产主义政权，推翻了匈牙利第一共和国。
description.en: A communist regime that existed for four months in 1919, overthrowing the First Hungarian Republic.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战后奥匈帝国解体，匈牙利独立后建立的共和国。
description.en: A republic established after the dissolution of Austria-Hungary and Hungary's independence following World War I.

description.zh-cn: 历史上的罗马尼亚君主国，曾出兵攻击匈牙利苏维埃共和国。
description.en: A historical Romanian monarchy that launched a military attack against the Hungarian Soviet Republic.

description.zh-cn: 前奥匈海军将军，在1920年至1944年期间担任匈牙利王国的摄政。
description.en: A former Austro-Hungarian admiral who served as Regent of the Kingdom of Hungary between 1920 and 1944.

description.zh-cn: 由摄政霍尔蒂·米克洛什统治的君主立宪制国家，在二战期间加入了轴心国。
description.en: A constitutional monarchy ruled by Regent Miklós Horthy, which joined the Axis powers during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次世界大战中由德国、意大利和日本组成的军事同盟。
description.en: A military alliance during World War II, consisting of Germany, Italy, and Japan.

description.zh-cn: 1933年至1945年间由纳粹党统治的德国。1944年出兵占领了匈牙利。
description.en: Germany under the rule of the Nazi Party from 1933 to 1945. It occupied Hungary in 1944.

description.zh-cn: 匈牙利的亲德法西斯政党，在1944年纳粹德国的支持下获得政权。
description.en: A pro-German fascist party in Hungary that came to power in 1944 with the support of Nazi Germany.

description.zh-cn: 1922年至1991年存在的社会主义国家。二战后使匈牙利成为其卫星国，并镇压了1956年匈牙利革命。
description.en: A socialist state that existed from 1922 to 1991. After World War II, it made Hungary a satellite state and suppressed the Hungarian Revolution of 1956.

description.zh-cn: 匈牙利在苏联影响下的社会主义国家时期。
description.en: The period when Hungary was a socialist state under the influence of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 一场反对匈牙利人民共和国政府和苏联统治的全国性革命，最终被苏联军队镇压。
description.en: A nationwide revolution against the government of the Hungarian People's Republic and its Soviet-imposed policies, which was ultimately suppressed by Soviet forces.

description.zh-cn: 匈牙利共产主义领导人，在1956年匈牙利革命失败后下台。
description.en: A Hungarian communist leader who stepped down after the failure of the Hungarian Revolution of 1956.

description.zh-cn: 匈牙利共产主义领导人，在1956年革命后出任匈牙利社会主义工人党第一书记，推行“古拉什共产主义”。
description.en: A Hungarian communist leader who became the First Secretary of the Hungarian Socialist Workers' Party after the 1956 revolution and implemented 'Goulash Communism'.

nodes.id: 匈牙利社会主义工人党

zh-cn: 匈牙利社会主义工人党

description.zh-cn: 匈牙利人民共和国时期的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party during the Hungarian People's Republic.

description.zh-cn: 卡达尔·亚诺什治下匈牙利的一种社会主义模式，特点是经济和文化相对自由。
description.en: A socialist model in Hungary under János Kádár, characterized by relative economic and cultural freedom.

description.zh-cn: 北大西洋公约组织的简称，是一个军事联盟。
description.en: Abbreviation for the North Atlantic Treaty Organization, a military alliance.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲联盟，一个欧洲的政治和经济联盟。
description.en: The European Union, a political and economic union in Europe.

description.zh-cn: 匈牙利政治人物，曾任匈牙利总统，于2010年提名奥班·维克多担任总理。
description.en: Hungarian politician, former President of Hungary, who nominated Viktor Orbán as Prime Minister in 2010.

nodes.id: 青年民主主义者联盟－匈牙利公民联盟

zh-cn: 青年民主主义者联盟－匈牙利公民联盟

description.zh-cn: 匈牙利的右翼民粹主义政党，由奥班·维克多领导。
description.en: A right-wing populist political party in Hungary, led by Viktor Orbán.

description.zh-cn: 匈牙利于2011年通过的新宪法，于2012年生效，将国名改为“匈牙利”。
description.en: The new constitution of Hungary, adopted in 2011 and effective from 2012, which changed the country's name to 'Hungary'.

description.zh-cn: 匈牙利的立法机构。
description.en: The legislative body of Hungary.

description.zh-cn: 在鄂图曼帝国入侵后，匈牙利王国分裂，其未被占领的部分成为哈布斯堡王朝的皇家领地。
description.en: After the Ottoman invasion, the Kingdom of Hungary was divided, and its unoccupied part became a royal domain of the Habsburg dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 舒尤克·道马什是匈牙利的现任总统。
description.en: Tamás Sulyok is the current President of Hungary.

description.zh-cn: 奥班·维克多是匈牙利的现任总理。
description.en: Viktor Orbán is the current Prime Minister of Hungary.

description.zh-cn: 克韦尔·拉斯洛是匈牙利的现任国民议会议长。
description.en: László Kövér is the current Speaker of the National Assembly of Hungary.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲议会投票通过议案，表示匈牙利自2018年以来不再是一个完全民主的国家。
description.en: The European Parliament passed a resolution stating that Hungary has not been a full democracy since 2018.

description.zh-cn: 阿尔帕德大公带领马扎尔人来到潘诺尼亚平原定居。
description.en: Árpád led the Magyars to settle in the Pannonian Plain.

description.zh-cn: 马扎尔人从乌拉山一带向西迁徙，于895年在多瑙河盆地建立了匈牙利公国。
description.en: The Magyars migrated west from the Ural Mountains region and founded the Principality of Hungary in the Danube Basin in 895.

description.zh-cn: 伊什特万一世于1000年登基为王，建立匈牙利王国。
description.en: Stephen I ascended the throne in 1000, establishing the Kingdom of Hungary.

description.zh-cn: 在蒙古第二次西征的攻击下，匈牙利王国遭到严重破坏。
description.en: The Kingdom of Hungary was severely damaged by the attacks of the Second Mongol invasion.

description.zh-cn: 第一次摩哈赤战役后，匈牙利被鄂图曼帝国局部控制。
description.en: After the Battle of Mohács, Hungary was partially controlled by the Ottoman Empire.

description.zh-cn: 第一次摩哈赤战役后，匈牙利封建国家解体，分裂成三个部分。
description.en: After the Battle of Mohács, the Hungarian feudal state disintegrated and was divided into three parts.

description.zh-cn: 1526年后，匈牙利王国仅存的部分成为奥地利哈布斯堡王朝的皇家领地。
description.en: After 1526, the remaining part of the Kingdom of Hungary became a royal territory of the Austrian Habsburg dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 大土耳其战争后，奥地利哈布斯堡王朝打败鄂图曼帝国，并将匈牙利统一。
description.en: After the Great Turkish War, the Austrian Habsburg Monarchy defeated the Ottoman Empire and unified Hungary.

description.zh-cn: 科苏特·拉约什领导了1848年的自由革命斗争。
description.en: Lajos Kossuth led the freedom revolution struggle of 1848.

description.zh-cn: 1848年匈牙利革命被奥地利帝国和俄罗斯帝国所扼杀。
description.en: The Hungarian Revolution of 1848 was suppressed by the Austrian and Russian Empires.

description.zh-cn: 1848年匈牙利革命被奥地利帝国和俄罗斯帝国所扼杀。
description.en: The Hungarian Revolution of 1848 was suppressed by the Austrian and Russian Empires.

description.zh-cn: 通过1867年奥匈折衷方案，哈布斯堡匈牙利王国与原奥地利帝国重组为奥匈帝国。
description.en: Through the Austro-Hungarian Compromise of 1867, the Habsburg Kingdom of Hungary and the former Austrian Empire were reorganized into Austria-Hungary.

description.zh-cn: 弗朗茨·约瑟夫一世兼任奥地利皇帝和匈牙利国王。
description.en: Franz Joseph I served as both Emperor of Austria and King of Hungary.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战后，奥匈帝国解体。
description.en: After World War I, Austria-Hungary dissolved.

description.zh-cn: 《特里阿农条约》的签订使匈牙利丧失了72%的领土和64%的人口。
description.en: The signing of the Treaty of Trianon caused Hungary to lose 72% of its territory and 64% of its population.

description.zh-cn: 共产党领导的政府上台推翻了匈牙利第一共和国并宣布匈牙利苏维埃共和国建立。
description.en: A communist-led government came to power, overthrew the First Hungarian Republic, and proclaimed the establishment of the Hungarian Soviet Republic.

description.zh-cn: 罗马尼亚军队攻占了首都布达佩斯，导致匈牙利苏维埃共和国政权崩溃。
description.en: Romanian forces captured the capital, Budapest, leading to the collapse of the Hungarian Soviet Republic.

description.zh-cn: 霍尔西以摄政名义统治匈牙利王国至1944年。
description.en: Horthy ruled the Kingdom of Hungary as Regent until 1944.

description.zh-cn: 1940年，霍尔蒂政府加入德意志轴心国。
description.en: In 1940, the Horthy government joined the German-led Axis powers.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国在得知霍尔蒂要退出轴心国时出兵占领匈牙利，并拘捕了霍尔蒂。
description.en: Nazi Germany occupied Hungary upon learning of Horthy's intention to withdraw from the Axis and arrested him.

description.zh-cn: 在德国的支持下，亲德的箭十字党获得匈牙利政权。
description.en: With German support, the pro-German Arrow Cross Party gained power in Hungary.

description.zh-cn: 二战后匈牙利成为苏联的卫星国，成立了匈牙利人民共和国。
description.en: After World War II, Hungary became a satellite state of the Soviet Union, establishing the Hungarian People's Republic.

description.zh-cn: 1956年匈牙利革命被苏联镇压。
description.en: The Hungarian Revolution of 1956 was suppressed by the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 1956年匈牙利革命失败后，格罗·埃诺下台。
description.en: After the failure of the Hungarian Revolution of 1956, Ernő Gerő stepped down.

description.zh-cn: 1956年革命失败后，改由卡达尔·亚诺什出任匈牙利社会主义工人党第一书记。
description.en: After the failure of the 1956 revolution, János Kádár was appointed First Secretary of the Hungarian Socialist Workers' Party.

description.zh-cn: 在卡达尔·亚诺什领导下，匈牙利改行古拉什共产主义。
description.en: Under the leadership of János Kádár, Hungary adopted Goulash Communism.

description.zh-cn: 1999年，匈牙利加入北约。
description.en: In 1999, Hungary joined NATO.

description.zh-cn: 2004年，匈牙利加入欧盟。
description.en: In 2004, Hungary joined the European Union.

description.zh-cn: 时任匈牙利总统绍约姆·拉斯洛提名奥班·维克多担任新政府总理。
description.en: Then-President of Hungary László Sólyom nominated Viktor Orbán as the new Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 匈牙利议会于2011年4月18日通过名为《基本法》的新宪法。
description.en: The Hungarian Parliament passed the new constitution, named the Fundamental Law, on April 18, 2011.

description.zh-cn: 新宪法《基本法》于2012年生效，将国名由“匈牙利共和国”改为“匈牙利”。
description.en: The new constitution, the Fundamental Law, came into effect in 2012, changing the country's name from 'Republic of Hungary' to 'Hungary'.
